verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Any crown I've ever worn
I lay it down
Any praise I've ever gained
I give it all to You
For there's nothing in this world
That can compare
For You alone are worthy
You alone are worthy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are near to all who call
Upon Your name
Ever giving, ever loving
You remain the same
For You open up Your hands
And satisfy
I give You all the glory
Give You all the glory

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are worthy oh Lord
Of all honour
You are worthy to receive
All praise
In Your presence I live
And with all I have to give
I will worship You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Honour You
Glorify Your holy name
I will worship You
Honor You
Glorify Your holy name
